job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Data Scientist / AI Engineer, your focus will be on the technical aspects of AI and data science. You will build, deploy, and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines to solve complex business problems. You get out of bed to take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them., * Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
     * Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content.
     * Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases.
     * Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers.
     * Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact.
     * Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions

   Data at DEPT®:
     * A team of passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies.
     * Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment.
     * A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.
     * Support for personal and professional growth through coaching, development plans, and budget allocation.
     * Diverse projects that cater to your ambitions, from short-term challenges to long-term engagements.
     * High-profile clients like Philips, Just Eat Takeaway, and bol.com, making you a proud ambassador of DEPT®.
     * The best of both worlds: the benefits of an international leading agency with the energy and spirit of a local studio.

   We are committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive environment for everyone at DEPT®. We seek unique individuals who want to enhance our work and community.
job_details.full_text:
Data Scientist / AI Engineer

As a Data Scientist / AI Engineer, your focus will be on the technical aspects of AI and data science. You will build, deploy, and maintain machine learning models, generative AI applications and MLOps pipelines to solve complex business problems. You get out of bed to take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them., * Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies
     * Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content.
     * Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases.
     * Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers.
     * Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact.
     * Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions

   Data at DEPT®:
     * A team of passionate data professionals who love working with cutting-edge technologies.
     * Opportunities to work in a dynamic and continuously evolving environment.
     * A culture that promotes creative freedom, trust, and autonomy.
     * Support for personal and professional growth through coaching, development plans, and budget allocation.
     * Diverse projects that cater to your ambitions, from short-term challenges to long-term engagements.
     * High-profile clients like Philips, Just Eat Takeaway, and bol.com, making you a proud ambassador of DEPT®.
     * The best of both worlds: the benefits of an international leading agency with the energy and spirit of a local studio.

   We are committed to fostering diversity and creating an inclusive environment for everyone at DEPT®. We seek unique individuals who want to enhance our work and community.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes building and deploying generative AI applications, fine-tuning LLMs, and working with frameworks like LangChain (implied by RAG and agents). While it mentions ML models, the explicit focus on LLMs and generative AI, alongside software development and MLOps for user-facing systems, aligns best with the GenAI Engineer profile. The mention of 'Data Scientist / AI Engineer' in the title also suggests a blend, but the core responsibilities lean towards generative AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content' directly relates to creating and training predictive models.
job_tasks.phrase: Build machine learning models for marketing attribution, predicting customer propensity, segmenting customer groups based on behavioural data, and recommending products and/or content

job_tasks.phrase: Fine-tune Large Language Models to business-specific use cases

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers' directly refers to the operational aspects of deploying and managing ML models.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploy MLOps pipelines together with our ML engineers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies' implies building and integrating systems, which is part of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Design and architect solutions using state-of-the-art frameworks and cloud technologies

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact' highlights the collaborative software development and integration aspect.
job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with data engineers, fellow data scientists/AI engineers and consultants to ensure seamless integration and deployment of AI solutions that create business impact

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them' indicates an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: take a business problem and deliver excellent technical solutions that resolve them

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions' clearly falls under communication skills.
job_tasks.phrase: Communicate with clients about complex solutions in an understandable way, deliver progress reports and demonstrations of AI solutions
